title: Homemade BBQ Sauce
directions: Whisk all ingredients together in a medium saucepan. Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to medium low and simmer (uncovered) for 20 minutes, or until the sauce has slightly thickened.
Use the sauce immediately, or refrigerate in a sealed container for up to 1 week.
ingredients: (optional: a few pinches of cayenne powder for extra heat, which I recommend)
